item.title: GigE and FastE Bandwidth Services
item.description: Companies routinely upgrade their bandwidth from older technologies like T1 lines to faster Ethernet options, often without significant cost increases. However, for those requiring substantial bandwidth, choices beyond these basic levels are necessary. Carrier Ethernet is becoming the preferred choice for medium to high bandwidth needs, replacing traditional DS3, T3, and SONET technologies. Ethernet offers cost advantages and greater flexibility in provisioning. Lower bandwidth Ethernet services commonly utilize existing copper telephone lines.

item.title: Speed of Metro Ethernet Zooming
item.description: Forget Superman, when it comes to speed and affordability, Metro Ethernet is the real superhero of business bandwidth solutions. It surpasses conventional options like T1 and DS3, offering significantly faster speeds at a lower cost. Metro Ethernet is in high demand, rapidly becoming the go-to choice for businesses. Its speed can be significantly higher than what you’re currently using, and it’s generally more cost-effective per Mbps compared to other options, including T1 lines.
